I was a cell phone repair technician for 3 years - Rice does not help with water! The rice does not pull any liquid from the device and certain types of rice can even worsen the condition of the phone due to some water possibly mixing with the rice and creating a greasy type of residue that will seep into it. Should your phone get water damaged, please take it to a reputable local cellphone repair shop ASAP!

Regarding the legitimacy of the pressure chamber, I haven't personally used something like this. And given the evidence from this video it may actually work (to a degree). Your take away from this should be if you have one, use it to remove the liquid and prevent further damage. However, there is likely still some form of damage to the device and I would highly recommend taking it to a repair shop ASAP even after possibly removing all of the water. This is because that water will create corrosion on the inside of the phone and create short circuits. Sometimes they're not that bad, but with further use of the phone it will continue to worsen.
